room_title: Escape room "Possessed Puppeteer" by Cooperstown Escape Rooms in Cooperstown
room_description: Lost love, shattered hearts and the revenge of a madman! Stitch together the sinister story of a twisted tailor who lost his one true love to a greedy textile baron from Utica. Sew together the pieces of his broken heart as you race against the clock and save New York from an army of evil puppets.
